reference.title: Setting recovery type
reference.shortdesc: Node recover type is set with the POST /controller/setRecoverType HTTP method and URI.

section.title: HTTP method and URI
section.p: Sets the recovery type to be performed for a node. Recovery options are delta node recovery or full recovery. The recovery type for a node is set after the node is failed over and before rebalance. Rebalance is required to apply the recovery.
The progress of setting recovery type can be tracked just like rebalance. After the data is persisted to disk and replicas are up-to-date, the node is put into the failed over state.
